embed_reply.title: Help me to improve this bot!

help.help_description: It's really necessary to explain the purpose of this command?

embed_reply.title: Command list
embed_reply.description:
```css
Available commands:
mc!help (command name)
mc!enable (#channel)
mc!disable (#channel)
mc!disableAll
mc!list
mc!update
mc!reset
mc!setTopic
mc!setDigit
mc!invite
mc!donate
mc!github /*Improve this bot!*/```

invite.help_description: Sends you a link for add this bot to your server!

embed_reply.title: Add this bot to your server now!

lang.help_description: Changes the bot language for this guild, you must have administrator permissions to run this command.
lang.error_not_found: I didn't find that language, try one of the following:
lang.error_no_admin: Only members with administrator permissions in this server can use this command.

enable.help_description: Enables and sets the channel that will be used for the counter.
enable.success: The counter has been enabled on {CHANNEL}.
enable.error_unknown: Something went wrong, try again later.
enable.error_no_admin: Only members with administrator permissions in this server can use this command.
enable.error_already_enabled: This channel already has a counter.

disable.success: The counter has been disabled on {CHANNEL}.
disable.error_unknown: Something went wrong, try again later.
disable.error_no_admin: Only members with administrator permissions in this server can use this command.

disableAll.help_description: Disables the counter on all channels.
disableAll.success: The counter has been disabled on all channels.
disableAll.error_unknown: Something went wrong, try again later.
disableAll.error_no_admin: Only members with administrator permissions in this server can use this command.

list.help_description: Lists all the channels that has a counter enabled.
list.list: The counter is enabled on the following channels:
list.no_channels: There are no channels with a counter enabled
list.error_unknown: Something went wrong, try again later.
list.error_no_admin: Only members with administrator permissions in this server can use this command.

reset.error_unknown: Something went wrong, try again later.
reset.error_no_admin: Only members with administrator permissions in this server can use this command.

setDigit.help_description:
Customizes numbers that will be displayed.

 Usage: ```mc!setDigit <plain number> <custom number>```
 Tip: You can use an emoji as a custom number.
setDigit.error_unknown: Something went wrong, try again later.
setDigit.error_no_admin: Only members with administrator permissions in this server can use this command.
setDigit.error_missing_params: Error: Missing parameters, more info: mc!help setDigit.

setTopic.help_description:
You can customize the topic with this command, remember to use `{COUNT}` or the count will never be displayed.

 Example: ```mc!setTopic Current members: {COUNT}```
setTopic.error_unknown: Something went wrong, try again later.
setTopic.error_no_admin: Only members with administrator permissions in this server can use this command.
setTopic.error_missing_params: Error: Missing parameters, more info: mc!help setTopic.

embed_reply.title: Enjoying my bot? Donate me! Any amount will be welcome, and your name will also be listed here: {DONATION_URL}

donate.error_exchange_fetch: Error while trying to fetch exchange rates

update.help_description: If you think the counter is stuck use this command to force its update
update.error_no_admin: Only members with administrator permissions in this server can use this command.

updateCounter.error_no_perms: Looks like I don't have permissions to set the topic of this channel. Please, give me the proper permissions or disable me using ``mc!disable``.
